Key Match Events: Andrew Wiggins exploded in the third quarter with 18 points on 8-of-7 shooting from the field with three made 3-pointers.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Warriors will welcome the Sacramento Kings to San Francisco on Sunday evening for the second leg of a back-to-back.
Others: The Warriors were shorthanded with Steph Curry, Brandin Podziemski and Gary Payton II all sidelined against the Memphis Grizzlies on Saturday night at Chase Center.
Jonathan Kuminga exited the game with an ankle injury late in the second quarter.
